full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SPYAN RAS GZIGS KYI SGO NAS BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I TSOGS MCHOD BYA TSUL BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,ZHES RNAL 'BYOR BA'I NANG GI TSOGS GSOG BDAG NYID CHEN PO'I TSOGS MCHOD BYA TSUL 'DI NI, MA nI SGRUB THABS ZAB MO NYAMS SU LEN PA RNAMS LA RGYUN DU 'KHYER BDE BAR BSAMS NAS, RJE BTZUN DAM PA BLA MA'I ZHABS RDUL SPYI BOR RIG PA'I SKAL BZANG MYOS BAN BZHAD RDOR MING CAN GYIS, DAM PA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS BYUNG BA LTAR, SA BYA DGUN 'BRING YAR TSES BCU GCIG LA DGA' LDAN 'OG MIN GLING DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI SDOM BRTZON DPYOD LDAN BSOD NAMS DBANG PHYUG GO , ,,'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN TSOGS GNYIS @007B BDE BLAG TU RDZOGS NAS RDO RJE 'CHANG GI GO 'PHANG MYUR DU 'THOB PAR  GYUR CIG , ,,)
